comments:
BIRT 1.0M1, Eclipse 3.1M5a, EMF 2.0.1, GEF 3.1M5, VE 1.0.2, Windows XP SP2.

I was trying to go through the tutorial and got stuck on the part where you drag
the customName column into the detail band. The drag-n-drop didn't do anything
except change the property view, and I tried to click around in the report to
figure out what happened. Eclipse started behaving strangely (refresh problems,
unresponsive) and the Error log included many tracebacks like this:
